Package gw.api.json

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonAccess<T>
    Specific kinds of JSON access, e.g.
    JsonAssertionHelper  
    JsonConfigAccess
    This class provides static methods for accessing JsonMappings, JsonSchemas, and mapping Filters.
    JsonDeserializationOptions
    Specifies options related to json deserialization.
    JsonLocation
    Simple class to combine a filename and line number.
    JsonObject
    A JsonObject is a Map of values, suitable for serializing out as JSON or XML, either with or without an associated JSON schema definition.
    JsonParser<T>
    Specific kinds of JSON parsing, e.g.
    JsonSerializationOptions
    Serialization of both JsonObject and TransformResult can be parameterized with various options that affect the resulting output.
    JsonValidationIssue
    Represents a single validation issue in a json file, consisting of the location at which the error occurred (which can be null), the severity of the problem, the display key to use for localization, and any message arguments.
    JsonValidationResult
    Represents a set of validation results.
    JsonVersion
    Schema/mapper versions are of the form: <MAJOR>.
    JsonVersion.Builder  
    JsonWrapper
    Base class for generated JSON schema wrapper classes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JsonValidationIssueSeverity
    Severity of a validation issue
    UnknownPropertyHandlingOption
    Possible values for how to handle unknown JSON properties, i.e. those not defined in the schema, during deserialization
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonParseException
    Thrown when the parser cannot parse a string containing json object.
